website_summaries.verdict: A classic slimline watch that's small enough for more petite users to wear.
pros: Perfect for anyone who wants a simple watch without too much adornment
Sturdy and well-constructed without being too bulky
Features Roman numeral hour markers, a date window, and three subdials that can be used as a stopwatch
cons: Compact face looks a bit crowded because of the subdials

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my wife 3 months ago and it's already fading and looks terrible.... Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James Evans

customer_reviews.title: The watch is more beautiful in person and IMO the prettiest in the MK lineup right now.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful. It’s very elegant, the chrono paired with Roman numerals make it stand out. It keeps time well- i haven’t lost or gained any in a week. Found this at an airport MK store- prettiest watch but the price was $250. I was pleased to find this gorgeous watch on Amazon for much less. I have a small wrist and the biggest i can wear is 36-37mm. This 36mm face is perfect. It was a pain to remove links with household tools but I was so excited to wear it right away. I should have ordered a kit the same time I ordered the watch to save myself the headache.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: On the inside of my watch says Micheal kor and ...
customer_reviews.text: On the inside of my watch says Micheal kor and not Micheal kors will be returning for full refund bunch of thieves
customer_reviews.author: Larissa D.

customer_reviews.title: MK Addict/ Great classic
customer_reviews.text: Best MK watch I've bought yet (up to around 12-15) !!! I have average/small size wrists. It fits on the second hole, which is typical. The leather will stretch & soften. The Bradshaw is my go to classic. This dial is 30mm- perfect women's size. My 43mm dials have just become overwhelming Michael Kors are my must durable watch. I'm unintentionally tough-screen scratches appear immediately in most brands. It took two years to get a scratch on my first MK watch. Which is what sold me on their brands. This is saffino leather. That is real leather with a wax coating machine pressed into the band. They are waterproof. I will update with any unforeseen problems.
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters 18th birthday! It was huge when we received it but we took it to a Michael Kors store and they removed the links for no charge. The watch is gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch! I’ve been eyeing it for awhile and my husband bought it for me for Mother’s Day. I like the Face size. It’s large, but not like wearing a Clock on your wrist! The quality exceeded my expectation. If you want to make someone very happy, this is the watch
customer_reviews.author: Darla H

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this watch
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this watch! I have a small wrist and i was afraid the face would be to big but it’s perfect. Definitely a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best affordable quality
customer_reviews.text: MK Bradshaw is a classic watch. This is a mini size. I've had mine for a couple of years now. Also have several other MK watches. They are the only ones I own that can handle my abuse. It took me 2 years to scratch my first watches' face! If you get above 38mm, the face is getting large. 43 is huge.
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch. I was worried it was going to ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. I was worried it was going to be a fake, but it was definitely authentic; came in a MK box with the appropriate care instructions and pamphlet. I read other reviews about the gold color fading and scratching off but I've been wearing it for almost a year now and I don't see any discolorations and it still looks brand new! The watch is big so I just went to my local MK store and got some links removed. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: This watch is absolutely beautiful! I'm sooo happy i got this good deal
customer_reviews.text: This watch is absolutely beautiful! I'm sooo happy i got this good deal. I was affraid to buy it online but i'm totally happy. Everything went out perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Ana Rute

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my choice!
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeing this MK kors watch for a while cant decide if I get this one or the MK 5605. I'm glad I bought this one fits perfect for small wrist. To give perspective buyer an idea. My wrist measures 5 1/2 inches in diameter and I included a picture on how it looked on my wrist. Not too bold and into your face piece of accessory. The other MK watch I'm looking at is 43mm compared to this one 36mm. Also the watch is not heavy at all but looks solid and a nice gold tone. A really good buy and got it for a good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Chris23mac

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! And just to have a piece of mind,I went to a Michael Kors store to check if watch is authentic and they said yes.
customer_reviews.author: Obella1126

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Love love this watch. I bought one in gold as well. Very functional, easy to use and can be dressed up or down. Not so big that it looks like you are wearing a mans watch. Nice size.
customer_reviews.author: DV

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a silver-toned watch for awhile. I love the meatiness of Michael Kors watches. The size is great. Not too big. And, the price was terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Lmadams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice watch, my 1st small face and I like it. It can be worn daily as it's not bulky. The band is for a small wrist, so if you dont have 1 you'll have to buy a larger band. The color is light brown not dark. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: c neal

customer_reviews.title: I love the style and quality of this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and quality of this watch....being a Senior it is so easy to read the numbers and it is great to have the date inserted.
customer_reviews.author: JUDITHKAIDA

customer_reviews.title: Small in Real Life
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty watch but it's way smaller than I thought it would be. It's just slightly larger than the old Timex watches you would see in drugstores back in the day. I guess that's what I get for buying a watch online.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie K. McCune

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous watch I've been looking for! The back of the watch was slightly dirty, which is the reason for my 4 stars. But, everything else is great! I have a skinny wrist that I had to remove all links, but the watch face doesn't look crazily big on me.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Once again, Michael Kors offers the perfect watch.
customer_reviews.text: I only wear Michael Kors watches. I love the selections of the size of the face and style. I personally have 5 different colors of his chronograph called The Bradshaw.... So, I was so happy to find this silver colored watch at a great price here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Wilde

customer_reviews.title: I got it today and tried it on and it's beautiful, but heavy
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this watch! I got it today and tried it on and it's beautiful, but heavy. After 5 minutes of wearing, my wrist was burning. Took it off and my wrist was all scratched up from the inside of the watch. Will be returning 😞
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, weight feels like a heavy duty. Absolutely love

I’m knocking off a star because the quality of material seems to be noticeably less than the watch that I was replacing.

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Mini Bradshaw Stainless Steel 36mm Chronograph Watch
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * Craft a ravishing look with the captivating beauty of this Michael Kors™ timepiece.
 * Shiny gold-tone stainless steel case and bracelet.
 * Fold-over clasp closure with push-button release.
 * Three-hand analog display with Japanese JS25 quartz movement, three sub-dials and date display window.
 * Chronograph functionality.
 * Super fine light champagne sunray dial includes Roman numeral and index hour markers.
 * Dial ring features minute track.
 * Water resistant 10 ATM/100 meters.
 * Measurements: *  Case Height: 35 mm
    *  Case Width: 35 mm
    *  Case Depth: 13 mm
    *  Band Width: 15 7⁄8 mm
    *  Band Circumference/Length: 9 in
    *  Weight: 5 oz
   
   






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :1.42 x 1.46 x 1.46 inches; 3.53 Ounces
 * Item model number :MK6174
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 LR44 batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :December 13, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Michael Kors Watches MFG Code
 * ASIN :B00PXMQDM4

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #124,217 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #56351 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #405 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars782 ratings 

 * Watch Sizing Guide
 * Craft a ravishing look with the captivating beauty of this Michael Kors™ timepiece.
 * Shiny gold-tone stainless steel case and bracelet.
 * Fold-over clasp closure with push-button release.
 * Three-hand analog display with Japanese JS25 quartz movement, three sub-dials and date display window.
 * Chronograph functionality.
 * Super fine light champagne sunray dial includes Roman numeral and index hour markers.
 * Dial ring features minute track.
 * Water resistant 10 ATM/100 meters.
 * Measurements: *  Case Height: 35 mm
    *  Case Width: 35 mm
    *  Case Depth: 13 mm
    *  Band Width: 15 7⁄8 mm
    *  Band Circumference/Length: 9 in
    *  Weight: 5 oz
feature_bullets: Round chronograph watch with tonal Roman numeral and notch hour marks on sunray dial with date window between four and five o'clock
36 mm stainless steel case with mineral dial window
Stainless steel band with fold-over clasp with double push-button safety
Water resistant to 50 m (165 ft): In general, suitable for short periods of recreational swimming, but not diving or snorkeling
